name: jerusalemhills-marketplace
description: Jerusalem Hills Marketplace with Stripe Checkout

scripts.minify: npm run minify:js && npm run minify:css
scripts.minify:js: terser js/analytics.js -o js/analytics.min.js --compress --mangle && terser js/adsense-config.js -o js/adsense-config.min.js --compress --mangle
scripts.minify:css: cleancss -o styles.min.css styles.css && cleancss -o styles-new.min.css styles-new.css

author: Jerusalem Hills
